page.title: 11Weston timber yard.
page.content:
Mr Norman Baily ownesws the timber yard in weston his son David Baily works with him,Norman Baily makes his own deliveries.He makes fenecs,sheds,seats,tables,wheelbarrows ,brid stands,and other things out of wood,he is open all hours.He has two Fordson tractors, he also has a workshop in which there is a saw bench,his office is a hut.He uses a small trailer for transportation.
MARKET GARDEN IN WESTON VILLAGE _________________________________ The market garden in weston is owned by a married couple who run the business jointly.They drive a mobile shop,sell groceries and fruit and grow crops in a unheated greenhouse.
